name: NooieRobot
0:
”Alexa, tell Nooie Robot to start cleaning.”
”Alexa, Ask Nooie Robot what it's doing right now”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: nooie robot
Developer Terms of Use
des:
START
 • Alexa, tell Nooie Robot to start cleaning.
 • Alexa, tell Nooie Robot to start.
 • Alexa, tell Nooie Robot to clean.
 • Alexa, tell Nooie Robot to clean all
 • Alexa, tell Nooie Robot to clean up.

PAUSE/RESUME
 • Alexa, tell Nooie Robot to pause.
 • Alexa, tell Nooie Robot to pause cleaning.
 • Alexa, tell Nooie Robot to resume.
 • Alexa, tell Nooie Robot to resume cleaning.


STOP
 • Alexa, tell Nooie Robot to stop.
 • Alexa, tell Nooie Robot to stop cleaning.

SEND TO DOCKING STATION
 • Alexa, tell Nooie Robot to go back home.
 • Alexa, tell Nooie Robot to return home.
 • Alexa, tell Nooie Robot to go home.
 • Alexa, tell Nooie Robot to go to the docking station.
 • Alexa, tell Nooie Robot to go back to the charging station.
 • Alexa, tell Nooie Robot to charge itself.
 • Alexa, tell Nooie Robot to charge.


STATUS 
 • Alexa, ask Nooie Robot what it’s doing.
 • Alexa, ask Nooie Robot if it’s done.
 • Alexa, ask Nooie Robot what it’s doing right now.

CLEAN SELECTED ROOMS OR AREAS

 • Alexa, ask Nooie Robot to clean my Kitchen
 • Alexa, tell Nooie Robot there is a mess in the Bedroom
*Full list of rooms is available in the app. Make sure you use the same room name on your map.
